globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://hcaptcha.com https://*.hcaptcha.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://js.hcaptcha.com https://hcaptcha.com https://*.hcaptcha.com https://web3forms.com; frame-src https://hcaptcha.com https://*.hcaptcha.com https://www.google.com https://maps.google.com; connect-src 'self' https://hcaptcha.com https://*.hcaptcha.com https://api.web3forms.com
